title: A plea from a member of oce
body:
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/retiring-dominion 


Can I just begin to say how unfair this is to OCE players?

"For players who’ve made the Crystal Scar their home over the last four years, we’ll be taking a snapshot of the queue today just before this post goes live. Then we’ll give out an exclusive, never-to-be-reproduced Summoner Icon to anyone with over 100 wins in matchmade Dominion games"

Okay so we had no chance at getting that icon... That's lovely...


But anyway some of us NEVER got a  chance to get these wins, Some of us NEVER got to play a game of dominion, I personally loved dominion and love it for hide and seek but I never got to play the real dominion ever, please riot, give us one chance to play dominion otherwise this will be super sad, I'd ask for a way to earn the icon too but that's not gonna happen... so could we please at least have dominion here in oce for maybe even a day a weekend... who knows, just give us a chance and please don't say " You're free to play it in a custom game" I want to play an official game of dominion and I know plenty of other oce members too.


This is a personal plea and I'm going to post it on the NA and OCE boards, please give us a chance to play this beloved game mode :(


Tl;dr: Please give oce a chance to play the rock mode </3 AND IF THERE ARE ANY OTHER servers like this then them too, everyone deserves a chance.



And before you say it might be back how it is now.




"We’re permanently disabling Dominion and removing the Crystal Scar from custom games on Monday, February 22."

To be honest the real mistake Riot has made is making the reward. Should of just axed the map, then MOST of these people crying over not being able to obtain the icon would have had nothing against it being removed.

However for those few that used to main Dominion back in the day and those who played Hide and Seek in custom games in my opinion should receive  something.   

I used to main Dominion before the server split and I only have 171 wins after months of playing (pre level 30). 100 wins was not a walk in the park and I was annoyed that it was put away in custom games years ago but when the Howling Abyss was introduced I realized that the only use for Crystal Star was hide and seek.
